author: Ramesh Susarla
title: COVID-19 testing laboratory starts functioning in Anantapur
description: Set up in Anantapur Government Medical College, it will become a regional hub for Rayalaseema; more so with Anantapur being a centre of people with foreign travel history
content: Now, waiting time for the results of throat swabs of COVID-19 suspects will drastically come down in Andhra Pradesh. Thanks to the testing centre - one of the four in the State - set up by the Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR) which began functioning … [+2745 chars]
